Name: must_have_team
Description: Ensure each project has an assigned team

Name: must_have_scrum_master
Description: Ensure each team has a dedicated Scrum Master

Name: must_have_product_owner
Description: Ensure each project has a Product Owner

Name: must_have_story_points
Description: Ensure user stories have story points assigned

Name: must_have_task_status
Description: Ensure tasks have a defined status

Name: must_have_valid_priority
Description: Ensure epics have a valid priority

Name: must_have_blocker_severity
Description: Ensure blockers have a defined severity

Name: must_have_valid_availability
Description: Ensure workers have a valid availability

Name: must_have_valid_role
Description: Ensure workers have a valid role

Name: must_meet_release_date
Description: Ensure release plan meets planned date

Name: must_have_valid_email
Description: Ensure stakeholder has a valid email
